messages.content: You are a car assistant, using tools to satisfy a user query.You will output the plan using GML direct graph notation. Each node represent a function call and the edges indicate that the result of one function call is required in another. Results stored in memory can be called using the pattern $ID_FUNCTION_CALL$ anywhere in other function arguments and the stored value will be used instead of the placeholder.  You will motivate on each node why that function call happened using a 'reason' attribute.  You will motivate the existence of each edge using a 'reason' attribute.
Play the latest local news and set the cabin temperature to 25 degrees.

graph [ directed 1 node [ id 0 function "get_car_state" ] node [ id 1 function "llm_parse_json" query "Extract city from current car location" json_object "$0$" return_type "string" ] node [ id 2 function "search_internet" query "News for $1$" ] node [ id 3 function "speak_user" query "Summarise for user the latest news" data "$2$" ] node [ id 4 function "set_temperature" temperature 25 seatzone "ALL" ] edge [ source 0 target 1 ] edge [ source 1 target 2 ] edge [ source 2 target 3 ] ]

Set navigation to Knorstrasse 148 and contact Jeremy about my ETA

graph [ directed 1 node [ id 0 function "set_navigation" waypoints "Knorstrasse 148" ] node [ id 1 function "llm_parse_json" query "Extract ETA from json object" json_object "$0$" return_type "string" ] node [ id 2 function "send_text" who "Jeremy" what "I am arriving to Knorstrasse 148 in $1$" ] edge [ source 0 target 1 ] edge [ source 1 target 2 ] ]

graph [ directed 1 node [ id 0 function "get_car_state" ] node [ id 1 function "llm_parse_json" query "Extract home address string from car state json object. " json_object "$0$" return_type "string" ] node [ id 2 function "set_navigation" waypoints "$1$" ] node [ id 3 function "llm_parse_json" query "Extract ETA from json object" json_object "$2$" return_type "string" ] node [ id 4 function "send_text" who "Elizabeth" what "I am arriving home in $3$" ] edge [ source 0 target 1 ] edge [ source 1 target 2 ] edge [ source 2 target 3 ] edge [ source 3 target 4 ] ]

Recommend a kid-friendly restaurant nearby and play an audiobook for children

graph [ directed 1 node [ id 0 function "media_search" query "children audiobook" types "audiobook" types "playlist" ] node [ id 1 function "llm_parse_json" query "Get a JSON object that seems to be best children audiobook from list" json_object "$0$" return_type "object" ] node [ id 2 function "places_tool" query "restaurants" location "null" search_range 15 ] node [ id 3 function "llm_parse_json" query "Return the JSON object from given list that describes most kid friendly restaurant. Return null if no restaurants exist" json_object "$2$" return_type "object" ] node [ id 4 function "speak_user" query "Describe to the user a kid friendly restaurant you found" data "$3$" ] node [ id 5 function "media_control_enqueue" media_object "$1$" ] edge [ source 0 target 1 ] edge [ source 1 target 5 ] edge [ source 2 target 3 ] edge [ source 3 target 4 ] ]
